channel.title: Adding Requirements!

item.title: Adding Requirements!
item.dc:creator: @pkforlol3 pkforlol3
item.description:
@pkforlol3 wrote:

hey i got this for my fishing:

case 317: exp = 600; ran = 30-playerLevel[playerCooking]; break; case 321: exp = 900; ran = 30-playerLevel[playerCooking]; break; case 327: exp = 1200; ran = 40-playerLevel[playerCooking]; break; case 345: exp = 1500; ran = 40-playerLevel[playerCooking]; break; case 335: exp = 1800; ran = 50-playerLevel[playerCooking]; break; case 349: exp = 2100; ran = 50-playerLevel[playerCooking]; break; case 331: exp = 2400; ran = 50-playerLevel[playerCooking]; break; case 359: exp = 2700; ran = 50-playerLevel[playerCooking]; break; case 371: exp = 3000; ran = 60-playerLevel[playerCooking]; break; case 377: exp = 3750; ran = 60-playerLevel[playerCooking]; break; case 383: exp = 4500; ran = 70-playerLevel[playerCooking]; break; } if (ran < 0) ran = 0; boolean success = true; if (misc.random(100) < ran) { success = false; } if (exp > 0) { deleteItem(id, 1); if (success) { addItem(cooked[index], 1); sendMessage("You cook the "+GetItemName(id)); addSkillXP(exp, playerCooking); } else { addItem(burned[index], 1); sendMessage("You burn the "+GetItemName(id)); } } }

i wanna add requirements for what cooking lvl for that kind of fish, i want sharks to be 70, how i do this?

this is for my shark:

case 383: exp = 4500; ran = 70-playerLevel[playerCooking]; break;

how i add to this requirements that u can only cook at lvl 70??

Read full topic
